\section{Connect Four}
\label{\detokenize{chap12/chap12:connect-four}}
The connect four game presented in the text, like the other two program presented here, is written as a front\sphinxhyphen{}end/back\sphinxhyphen{}end pair. The front\sphinxhyphen{}end code can be \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{downloaded}} here. The front\sphinxhyphen{}end requires the \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{redchecker.gif}} and the \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{blackchecker}} files be in the same directory.

Your challenge is to write the back\sphinxhyphen{}end code for this program that beats the author’s back\sphinxhyphen{}end code. The architecture for your back\sphinxhyphen{}end is described at the top of the front\sphinxhyphen{}end code.
If you wish to run this program works without writing your own back\sphinxhyphen{}end, you can \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{download}} the c4.fas file here. This file requires CLISP be installed to run. The c4.fas file must be placed in the same directory as the front\sphinxhyphen{}end c4.py program to run.

Here is the front\sphinxhyphen{}end code for your reference.

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\},numbers=left,firstnumber=1,stepnumber=1]
\PYG{k+kn}{import} \PYG{n+nn}{turtle}
\PYG{k+kn}{import} \PYG{n+nn}{subprocess}
\PYG{k+kn}{import} \PYG{n+nn}{tkinter}
\PYG{k+kn}{import} \PYG{n+nn}{sys}
\PYG{k+kn}{import} \PYG{n+nn}{time}

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} The following program will play connect four. This front\PYGZhy{}end}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} program and a back\PYGZhy{}end program communicate through pipes (both input and output)}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} according to this architecture. When a command is sent it is indicated }
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} with a right arrow indicating something is written to the other program\PYGZsq{}s }
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} standard input. When the other program sends something to this Python Program}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} it is indicated with a left arrow. That means it is written to the standard}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} output of the other program. }

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} front\PYGZhy{}end   back\PYGZhy{}end      }
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}   0 \PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZgt{}     \PYGZsh{} New Game is initiated by the front\PYGZhy{}end code}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}   \PYGZlt{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{} 0     \PYGZsh{} Back\PYGZhy{}end code says OK.}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}   2 M \PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZgt{}     \PYGZsh{} Human Move followed by Move Value M which is 0\PYGZhy{}6.}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}                      \PYGZsh{} Move Value M will be on separate line.}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}   \PYGZlt{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{} 0     \PYGZsh{} Back\PYGZhy{}end code says OK.}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}   1 \PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZgt{}     \PYGZsh{} Computer Move is indicated to back\PYGZhy{}end code.}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}   \PYGZlt{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{} 0 M     \PYGZsh{} Status OK and Move Value M which is 0\PYGZhy{}6.}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}   3 \PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZgt{}     \PYGZsh{} Game Over?}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}   \PYGZlt{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{} Val     \PYGZsh{} Val is 0=Not Over, 1=Computer Won, 2=Human Won, 3=Tie.}

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} If you wish to implement your own back\PYGZhy{}end you must alter the line of code below}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} that looks like this:}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} proc = subprocess.Popen([\PYGZdq{}clisp\PYGZdq{},\PYGZdq{}c4.fas\PYGZdq{}],stdout=subprocess.PIPE, \PYGZbs{}}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}    stdin=subprocess.PIPE,universal\PYGZus{}newlines=True)}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} You must replace clisp with the program that starts your program running. If you}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} have written your back\PYGZhy{}end with python 3.x then replace clisp with python3. }
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} The c4.fas should be replaced by any command\PYGZhy{}line arguments to your program. If }
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} you have written your program in python, then the argument should be the name of your}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} program which must be in the same directory as this front\PYGZhy{}end code. }
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Output that you want to print for debugging purposes can be written to standard error}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} instead of standard output. In this way standard output can be used to communicate}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} with the front\PYGZhy{}end while you still see output printed to the terminal window for }
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} debugging purposes. In python, standard error can be written to as follows:}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} import sys}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} sys.stderr.write(\PYGZsq{}Your text goes here.\PYGZbs{}n\PYGZsq{})}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} This architecture must be adhered to strictly for this program to work. Here}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} is sample Lisp code that will handle this interaction. However, the other }
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} program may be written in any programming language, including Python.}

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}(defun play ()}
  \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}(let ((gameBoard (make\PYGZhy{}hash\PYGZhy{}table :size 10))}
        \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}(memo (make\PYGZhy{}hash\PYGZhy{}table :size 27 :test \PYGZsh{}\PYGZsq{}equalp))}
        \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}(lastMove nil))}

    \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}(do () (nil nil)}
        \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{};(printBoard gameBoard)}
        \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}(let ((msgId (read)))}
          \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}(cond ((equal msgId 2) ;; Human turn to call human turn function}
                 \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}(setf lastMove (humanTurn gameBoard)))}

                \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}((equal msgId 0) ;; New Game message}
                 \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}(progn }
                   \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}(setf gameBoard (make\PYGZhy{}hash\PYGZhy{}table :size 10))}
                   \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}(setf memo (make\PYGZhy{}hash\PYGZhy{}table :size 27 :test \PYGZsh{}\PYGZsq{}equalp))}
                   \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}(format t \PYGZdq{}0\PYGZti{}\PYGZpc{}\PYGZdq{})))}
                   \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{};; Return a 0 to indicate the computer is ready}

                \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}((equal msgId 1) ;; Computer Turn message}
                 \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}(setf lastMove (computerTurn gameBoard)))}
                
                \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}((equal msgId 3) ;; Get Game Status}
                 
                 \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}(cond ((equal (evalBoard gameBoard lastMove) 1) (format t \PYGZdq{}1\PYGZti{}\PYGZpc{}\PYGZdq{}))}
                       \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{};; The Computer Won}

                       \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}((equal (evalBoard gameBoard lastMove) \PYGZhy{}1) (format t \PYGZdq{}2\PYGZti{}\PYGZpc{}\PYGZdq{}))}
                       \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{};; The Human Won}

                       \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}((fullBoard gameBoard) (format t \PYGZdq{}3\PYGZti{}\PYGZpc{}\PYGZdq{}))}
                       \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{};; It\PYGZsq{}s a draw}

                       \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}(t (format t \PYGZdq{}0\PYGZti{}\PYGZpc{}\PYGZdq{}))))}
                       \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{};; The game is not over yet.}

                \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}(t (format t \PYGZdq{}\PYGZhy{}1\PYGZti{}\PYGZpc{}\PYGZdq{})))))))}

\PYG{n}{Computer} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{l+m+mi}{1}
\PYG{n}{Human} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{l+m+mi}{1}

\PYG{k}{class} \PYG{n+nc}{Tile}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{turtle}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{RawTurtle}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
    \PYG{k}{def} \PYG{n+nf+fm}{\PYGZus{}\PYGZus{}init\PYGZus{}\PYGZus{}}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{canvas}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{row}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{col}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{app}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
        \PYG{n+nb}{super}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n+nf+fm}{\PYGZus{}\PYGZus{}init\PYGZus{}\PYGZus{}}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{canvas}\PYG{p}{)}
        \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{val} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{l+m+mi}{0}
        \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{row} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{row}
        \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{col} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{col}
        \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{tttApplication} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{app}
        \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{penup}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}
        \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{ht}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}
        \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{goto}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{col}\PYG{o}{*}\PYG{l+m+mi}{100}\PYG{o}{+}\PYG{l+m+mi}{50}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{row}\PYG{o}{*}\PYG{l+m+mi}{100}\PYG{o}{+}\PYG{l+m+mi}{50}\PYG{p}{)}
        
    \PYG{k}{def} \PYG{n+nf}{setShape}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{horc}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{screen}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
        \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{val} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{horc}
        
        \PYG{k}{if} \PYG{n}{horc} \PYG{o}{==} \PYG{n}{Computer}\PYG{p}{:}
            \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{shape}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{blackchecker.gif}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{)} 
        \PYG{k}{else}\PYG{p}{:}
            \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{shape}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{redchecker.gif}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{)} 
        
        \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{drop}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{screen}\PYG{p}{)} 

    \PYG{k}{def} \PYG{n+nf}{getOwner}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
        \PYG{k}{return} \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{val}
    
    \PYG{k}{def} \PYG{n+nf}{clicked}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
        \PYG{n+nb}{print}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{row}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{col}\PYG{p}{)}
        
    \PYG{k}{def} \PYG{n+nf}{drop}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{screen}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
        \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{goto}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{col}\PYG{o}{*}\PYG{l+m+mi}{100}\PYG{o}{+}\PYG{l+m+mi}{50}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{l+m+mi}{0}\PYG{p}{)}
        \PYG{n}{screen}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{tracer}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{1}\PYG{p}{)}
        \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{speed}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{5}\PYG{p}{)}
        \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{st}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}
        \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{goto}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{col}\PYG{o}{*}\PYG{l+m+mi}{100}\PYG{o}{+}\PYG{l+m+mi}{50}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{row}\PYG{o}{*}\PYG{l+m+mi}{100}\PYG{o}{+}\PYG{l+m+mi}{55}\PYG{p}{)}
        \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{goto}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{col}\PYG{o}{*}\PYG{l+m+mi}{100}\PYG{o}{+}\PYG{l+m+mi}{50}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{row}\PYG{o}{*}\PYG{l+m+mi}{100}\PYG{o}{+}\PYG{l+m+mi}{45}\PYG{p}{)}
        \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{goto}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{col}\PYG{o}{*}\PYG{l+m+mi}{100}\PYG{o}{+}\PYG{l+m+mi}{50}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{row}\PYG{o}{*}\PYG{l+m+mi}{100}\PYG{o}{+}\PYG{l+m+mi}{50}\PYG{p}{)}
        \PYG{n}{screen}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{tracer}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{0}\PYG{p}{)}

        \PYG{k}{def} \PYG{n+nf}{HumanTurn}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{x}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{n}{y}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
            \PYG{k}{if} \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{running}\PYG{p}{:} 
                \PYG{k}{return}
            
            \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}status = checkStatus()}
            
            \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}if status != 0:}
                \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}return}
            
            \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{running} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{k+kc}{True}
            \PYG{n}{col} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n+nb}{int}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{x}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{o}{/}\PYG{o}{/} \PYG{l+m+mi}{100}

            \PYG{k}{while} \PYG{n}{row} \PYG{o}{\PYGZgt{}}\PYG{o}{=} \PYG{l+m+mi}{0} \PYG{o+ow}{and} \PYG{n}{matrix}\PYG{p}{[}\PYG{n}{row}\PYG{p}{]}\PYG{p}{[}\PYG{n}{col}\PYG{p}{]}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{isvisible}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
                \PYG{n}{row} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{row} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}} \PYG{l+m+mi}{1}
            
            \PYG{k}{if} \PYG{n}{row} \PYG{o}{\PYGZlt{}} \PYG{l+m+mi}{0}\PYG{p}{:}
                \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}Then we clicked in a column that was already full.}
                \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{running} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{k+kc}{True}
                \PYG{k}{return} 
              
            \PYG{n}{val} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{row} \PYG{o}{*} \PYG{l+m+mi}{7} \PYG{o}{+} \PYG{n}{col}
            
            \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Do the Human Turn}
            \PYG{n}{toOther}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{write}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{2}\PYG{l+s+se}{\PYGZbs{}n}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{)}
            \PYG{n}{toOther}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{flush}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}
            \PYG{n}{toOther}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{write}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nb}{str}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{val}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{o}{+} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+se}{\PYGZbs{}n}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{)}
            \PYG{n}{toOther}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{flush}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}
            
            \PYG{n}{status} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{fromOther}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{readline}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{strip}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}
            \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}print(\PYGZdq{}Status is \PYGZdq{},status)}

            \PYG{n}{screen}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{update}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}
            
            \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Check the status of the game}
            \PYG{n}{status} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{checkStatus}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}
            
            \PYG{k}{if} \PYG{n}{status} \PYG{o}{==} \PYG{l+m+mi}{0}\PYG{p}{:}

\PYG{k}{if} \PYG{n+nv+vm}{\PYGZus{}\PYGZus{}name\PYGZus{}\PYGZus{}} \PYG{o}{==} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZus{}\PYGZus{}main\PYGZus{}\PYGZus{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:}
    \PYG{n}{main}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}
